Title: AN ACT APPLYING THE GENERAL PROVISIONS OF THE ELECTION LAW TO THE ELECTION OF ASSEMBLYMEN FROM THE PROVINCES OF LANAO, COTABATO, AND SULU.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 44, October 13, 1936 ]
AN ACT APPLYING THE GENERAL PROVISIONS OF THE ELECTION LAW TO THE ELECTION OF ASSEMBLYMEN FROM THE PROVINCES OF LANAO, COTABATO, AND SULU.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The general provisions of the Election Law are hereby applied to the election of Members to the National Assembly from the Provinces of Lanao, Cotabato, and Sulu.(aw√ûhi(
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, October 13, 1936.
